mapper.select: SELECT QNA.QNA_ID, QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_VAL, QNA.QNA_TITLE, U.U_NICKNAME , TO_CHAR(QNA.QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_DATE FROM QNA JOIN U ON QNA.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN QNA_TYPE ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_ID = QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_ID WHERE QNA.BO_STU_ID LIKE 1 ORDER BY QNA.QNA_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM QNA

SELECT QNA.QNA_ID, QNA.SE_TYPE_ID, QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_ID, QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_VAL, QNA.QNA_TITLE, U.U_NICKNAME , QNA.QNA_URL, QNA.QNA_FILE, TO_CHAR(QNA.QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_DATE FROM QNA JOIN U ON QNA.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN QNA_TYPE ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_ID = QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_ID WHERE QNA_TITLE LIKE #{key }

SELECT QNA.QNA_ID, QNA.SE_TYPE_ID, QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_ID, QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_VAL, QNA.QNA_TITLE, QNA.QNA_CONTENT, U.U_NICKNAME , QNA.QNA_URL, QNA.QNA_FILE, TO_CHAR(QNA.QNA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS QNA_DATE FROM QNA JOIN U ON QNA.U_ID = U.U_ID JOIN QNA_TYPE ON QNA.QNA_TYPE_ID = QNA_TYPE.QNA_TYPE_ID WHERE QNA.QNA_ID = #{qna_id }
